resources.string: Master switch is off. Turn it on to enable all the features of the app. To turn it on, tap the power button above.
Master switch is on. All the features of the app are enabled. Turn it off to disable all the features of the app. To turn it off, tap the power button above.
Απαιτείται root πρόσβαση για να λειτουργήσει το Night Light.
Ο kernel σας δεν υποστηρίζει KCAL. Το KCAL είναι ένα χαρακτηριστικό συντονισμού των οθονών για συσκευές Qualcomm. Η υποστήριξη KCAL είναι απαραίτητη για να λειτουργήσει το Night Light.
Αυτόματη ενεργοποίηση του Night Light στο ορισμένο χρονικό διάστημα. Το Night Light θα απενεργοποιηθεί αυτόματα εκτός αυτού του διαστήματος.

This enables the use of minimum and maximum intensities as a part of automated time schedule. If enabled, the minimum intensity will be applied from start time to dark hours start time, and maximum intensity will be used then on until the schedule ends.
Time must be in between schedule start time and end time

Το Night Light χρησιμοποιεί KCAL, το οποίο είναι ένα χαρακτηριστικό συντονισμού των οθονών για συσκευές Qualcomm νέας γενιάς, για την ρύθμιση έντασης του μπλε φωτός, που καθιστά πιο ξεκούραστη για τα μάτια την χρήση του κινητού στο σκοτάδι και βοηθά στον ύπνο. Εφόσον πραγματοποιεί αλλαγές σε επίπεδο driver και δεν χρησιμοποιεί επικαλύψεις λογισμικού, δεν έχει αντίκτυπο στην μπαταρία και η αλλαγή είναι ορατή σε όλη την οθόνη.
Δεν ήταν δυνατή η λήψη της τελευταίας σας γνωστής τοποθεσίας.
Value of the color temperature to be set. Lower temperatures are better suitable for low light viewing.
Set the delay after which Night Light settings will be restored and applied after boot. Night Light settings will be applied after %s delay.
Looks like Night Light settings were restored but could not be applied after most recent boot. Consider increasing this delay so that settings can be successfully restored and applied after boot.
You can configure your old KCAL settings here. These settings will applied when night light is turned off.
Create a profile (collection of settings), which you can then apply it easily with one click, or use apps like Tasker apply it for you,
A profile with same name already exists, please try another name.
Tap the + button to start setting up a profile
Are you sure want to delete the %1$s profile?
Are you sure you want use %1$s profile as a part of your Tasker plugin routine?
To use tasker plugin, you must enable Master Switch first.
Profiles are collection of settings which can be applied with one click, or let apps like Tasker to apply it for you using the automation capabilities that they provide.
Backup current KCAL values every time before Night Light is enabled
Manual KCAL color controls gives you full freedom on how you would like to tune display colors so that your needs are met.

Type of color intensity to be applied. There are 2 intensity types available: Maximum and Minimum. You may want to use the maximum intensity in dark environments, and the minimum intensity in lighted environments at evening. Tap the bulb in dashboard to switch between intensity types when Night Light is on.
Enables light theme with light background and slightly different looks.
Night Light settings will be restored on boot.
Night Light settings will not be restored on boot.
Following properties will be applied when this profile is applied. If night light is off, color setting will not be applied.
Press the bulb above to toggle night light. Long press the bulb above to toggle intensities.
